name: Cup Cakes - Free Match Maker Puzzle Catch Game
name_original: Cup Cakes - Free Match Maker Puzzle Catch Game
description:
Connect matching cup cakes by color with pipe to create a flow. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes (lines) will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give CupCakes Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like Chef"!
Content
- Over 1,000 free levels available in Free Play mode
- 10 different board sizes
- Additional level packs available for purchase

Look & Feel
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Colorful UI
- Fun sound effects
- Clean vector graphics and animations
